tool_description: Crawls social media platforms using their APIs or public interfaces to collect posts, comments, and engagement data based on search terms or hashtags.

platforms.description: Social media platforms to crawl (twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, reddit)

search_terms.description: Keywords or hashtags to search for

max_posts_per_term.description: Maximum posts to collect per search term (1-500)

time_range_hours.description: Time range in hours to look back (1-168)

include_replies.description: Whether to include replies and comments

api_key.description: API key for accessing social media platforms

error_messages: Unsupported platform: Only twitter, facebook, instagram, linkedin, reddit are supported.
Invalid API key: Provide a valid API key for the selected platforms.
Posts limit out of range: max_posts_per_term must be between 1 and 500.
Invalid time range: time_range_hours must be between 1 and 168.
Rate limit exceeded: API rate limit reached, reduce request frequency.
Invalid language code: Use a valid ISO 639-1 language code.
usage: Specify platforms and search terms along with API credentials. Configure post limits and time ranges as needed. The tool returns collected social media posts.

platforms_used.description: Platforms from which posts were collected

total_posts_collected.description: Total number of posts collected across all platforms
